document.full_text: rafael nadal beat david ferrer 6-2, 6-4 in their second all-spanish final in two weeks to claim his sixth barcelona open title sunday.
document.title: nadal beats ferrer to win sixth barcelona open
lines_and_colors: rafael nadal beat david ferrer 6-2, 6-4 in their second all-spanish final in two weeks to claim his sixth barcelona open title sunday.
